about_the_game:
Gemaboy Zero X is an action, exploration, and platform Cyberpunk Ploidmania videogame. It is the latest installment in the PLOIDS saga in which Omega will have to travel through time to preserve it and rescue his beloved Alpha. Gemaboy Zero X is inspired by classic games, while additionally, mixing run and gun mechanics with metroidvania for main gameplay, and various mini-games with shoot’em up structure, mini puzzles, and more. With this we will reach the climax of the PLOIDS saga.


💬 - How far will you go to save your true love without alternating the flow of time? 🕑 Gemaboy Zero X is an action, exploration, and platform Cyberpunk Ploidmania Videogame. It is the latest installment in the PLOIDS saga in which Omega will have to travel through time to preserve it and rescue his beloved Alpha.

💬 - Explore the thematic levels in the order you want, copy the Skillmaster power 🧬, face fearsome bosses inspired by classic gameplay, and travel through time and space. Make the decision you feel is correct without changing the story to reach the true and final outcome.

🤖 - Ploidvania + Run and Gun exploration.

‍🔧 - Upgrade your weapon inventory by copying the Skillmaster Power depending on the needs of the level.

🕹️ - FRIKIROOM MODE: A room filled with all unlocked Arcade minigames for extra fun

And much more!...


⚙️ - A couple of years after the events of PLOID and Gemaboy Zero Origins, the Ploids have formed the Time and Space Patrol (T.S.P.) to avoid repeating the VOID + story with Dr. Elo. Alpha and Omega Ploids enter a new link of evolution due to time travel, making them PLOID X, an ability that temporarily improves their systems allowing them to fight. Alpha is kidnapped by Dr. Elo so he can extract the essence within her that allowed for the evolutional change in her DNA to PLOID X. With this, Dr. Elo manages to create his own army of PLOIDS X by modifying regular PLOIDS. Omega decides to take action and end Dr. Elo's plans by defeating his PLOIDS X to weaken him before the final fight.
detailed_description:
Gemaboy Zero X is an action, exploration, and platform Cyberpunk Ploidmania videogame. It is the latest installment in the PLOIDS saga in which Omega will have to travel through time to preserve it and rescue his beloved Alpha. Gemaboy Zero X is inspired by classic games, while additionally, mixing run and gun mechanics with metroidvania for main gameplay, and various mini-games with shoot’em up structure, mini puzzles, and more. With this we will reach the climax of the PLOIDS saga.


💬 - How far will you go to save your true love without alternating the flow of time? 🕑 Gemaboy Zero X is an action, exploration, and platform Cyberpunk Ploidmania Videogame. It is the latest installment in the PLOIDS saga in which Omega will have to travel through time to preserve it and rescue his beloved Alpha.

💬 - Explore the thematic levels in the order you want, copy the Skillmaster power 🧬, face fearsome bosses inspired by classic gameplay, and travel through time and space. Make the decision you feel is correct without changing the story to reach the true and final outcome.

🤖 - Ploidvania + Run and Gun exploration.

‍🔧 - Upgrade your weapon inventory by copying the Skillmaster Power depending on the needs of the level.

🕹️ - FRIKIROOM MODE: A room filled with all unlocked Arcade minigames for extra fun

And much more!...


⚙️ - A couple of years after the events of PLOID and Gemaboy Zero Origins, the Ploids have formed the Time and Space Patrol (T.S.P.) to avoid repeating the VOID + story with Dr. Elo. Alpha and Omega Ploids enter a new link of evolution due to time travel, making them PLOID X, an ability that temporarily improves their systems allowing them to fight. Alpha is kidnapped by Dr. Elo so he can extract the essence within her that allowed for the evolutional change in her DNA to PLOID X. With this, Dr. Elo manages to create his own army of PLOIDS X by modifying regular PLOIDS. Omega decides to take action and end Dr. Elo's plans by defeating his PLOIDS X to weaken him before the final fight.

name: Gemaboy Zero X

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad @ 2.8 GHz or AMD Phenom X4
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X6
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti

short_description: Gemaboy Zero X is an action, exploration, and platform Cyberpunk Ploidmania videogame. It is the latest installment in the PLOIDS saga in which Omega will have to travel through time to preserve it and rescue his beloved Alpha!
